defaultCompany.address: One Apple Park Way, Cupertino, CA 95014
defaultCompany.description:
Apple Inc. designs, manufactures and markets smartphones, personal computers, tablets, wearables and accessories, and sells a variety of related services. The Companies products
              include iPhone, Mac, iPad, and Wearables, Home and Accessories. iPhone is the Companies line of smartphones based on its iOS operating system

defaultCompany.address: 2200 Mission College Blvd., Santa Clara, CA
defaultCompany.description: We create world-changing technology that improves the life of every person on the planet. We are inspired to: Drive innovation that makes the world safer, builds healthy and vibrant communities, and increases productivity. We have big ambitions, and a growing sense of urgency to work with others and address world challenges no one can tackle alone.
